title: The Big Lie In Georgia (1427)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the explosive new revelations about the Georgia election, and the ridiculous media spin behind it. 

News Picks: 


Watch the hypocritical Democrats object to the counting of the electoral college votes in 2001 and 2005.

A stunning article alleging “vote switching” in Georgia. 


Where are the chain of custody documents for these absentee ballots in Georgia?

Why won’t the Georgia Secretary of State answer simple questions about the election?


Tuesday and Wednesday are going to be busy. 


Pelosi bans gender terms like “mother” and “father” in new House rules. 

Have we been visited by aliens?


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
